name: ListZoomMeetingPolls
description:
Retrieve all polls for a specified Zoom meeting.

Use this tool to list all polls associated with a scheduled Zoom meeting. The meeting host must be of Pro user type or higher, and polls are only available for scheduled, not instant, meetings.

parameters.name: zoom_meeting_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Zoom meeting. Ensure it is stored as a long format number since IDs can exceed 10 digits.

value_schema.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, you must store it as a long format integer and **not** an integer. Meeting IDs can exceed 10 digits.

parameters.name: query_anonymous_polls
parameters.description: Set to true to query for polls with the Anonymous option enabled. False excludes them.

value_schema.description:
Whether to query for polls with the **Anonymous** option enabled: 
* `true` — Query for polls with the **Anonymous** option enabled. 
* `false` — Do not query for polls with the **Anonymous** option enabled.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom Meetings API.

parameters.name: anonymous
parameters.description:
Whether to query for polls with the **Anonymous** option enabled: 
* `true` — Query for polls with the **Anonymous** option enabled. 
* `false` — Do not query for polls with the **Anonymous** option enabled.

value_schema.description:
Whether to query for polls with the **Anonymous** option enabled: 
* `true` — Query for polls with the **Anonymous** option enabled. 
* `false` — Do not query for polls with the **Anonymous** option enabled.

parameters.name: meetingId
parameters.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, you must store it as a long format integer and **not** an integer. Meeting IDs can exceed 10 digits.

value_schema.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, you must store it as a long format integer and **not** an integer. Meeting IDs can exceed 10 digits.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
